SEARCH
Package com.csse3200.game.areas.Generation

Class MapGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.areas.Generation.MapGenerator
public class MapGenerator extends Object
The MapGenerator class is responsible for generating and managing a game map. It creates rooms, connects them, and provides methods to manipulate and export the map.

    • MapGenerator

      public MapGenerator(int mapSize, String seed)
      Constructs a new MapGenerator with the specified map size and seed.
      Parameters:
      mapSize - The size of the map to generate.
      seed - The seed for the random number generator.

  • Method Details

    • addRoomAtPosition

      public void addRoomAtPosition(int x, int y, int animal_index, int item_index, int detlas_index)
      Adds a room at the specified position and connects it to an existing room.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the new room.
      y - The y-coordinate of the new room.
      animal_index - The index of the animal in the new room.
      item_index - The index of the item in the new room.
      detlas_index - The index of the direction to connect the new room.

    • getPositions

      public HashMap<String,List<String>> getPositions()
      Gets the relative positions of all rooms in the map.
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing the relative positions of all rooms.

    • getRoomDetails

      public HashMap<String,HashMap<String,Integer>> getRoomDetails()
      Gets the details of all rooms in the map.
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing the details of all rooms.

    • parseIntRelativeLocation

      public int[] parseIntRelativeLocation(String string)
      Parses a string representation of a relative location into integer coordinates.
      Parameters:
      string - The string representation of the location.
      Returns:
      An array of two integers representing the x and y coordinates.

      public String exportToJson(String filePath)
      Exports the map data to a JSON file.
